Installation¶

From the PyPI¶

$ pip install -U textblob
$ curl https://raw.github.com/sloria/TextBlob/master/download_corpora.py | python

This will install textblob and download the necessary NLTK corpora.

If you don’t have pip (you should), run this first:

$ curl https://raw.github.com/pypa/pip/master/contrib/get-pip.py | python

From Source¶

TextBlob is actively developed on Github.

You can clone the public repo:

git clone https://github.com/sloria/TextBlob.git

Or download one of the following:

  • tarball
  • zipball

Once you have the source, you can install it into your site-packages with

$ python setup.py install

Python¶

TextBlob supports Python >=2.6 or >=3.3.

Dependencies¶

PyYAML is TextBlob‘s only external dependency. It will be installed automatically when you run pip install textblob or python setup.py install. A vendorized version of NLTK is bundled internally.
